name: [Prototype] 4088MatchBalls
description:
Gameplay

Click on a ball to select it, click on any other ball to swap their positions.

Goal

Remove as many balls from the game with the least amount of moves.

How to Play

Form groups of 3 or more same colored balls in a row/column to create a match. If a ball is matched its value is halved and it's moved to a random position.
